resource.title: Atom Feed Document
resource.documentation: An Atom Feed Document is a representation of an Atom feed, including metadata about the feed, and some or all of the entries associated with it. Its root is the atom:feed element.

resource.title: Atom Entry Document
resource.documentation: An Atom Entry Document represents exactly one Atom entry, outside of the context of an Atom feed. Its root is the atom:entry element.
